sentence.Network_en: They seriously believe that capital punishment is a deterrent.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们真的相信死刑具有威慑作用。

sentence.Network_en: Hopefully his punishment will act as a deterrent to others.
sentence.Network_cn: 对他的惩罚但愿能起到杀一儆百的作用。

sentence.Network_en: Long prison sentences can be a very effective deterrent for offenders.
sentence.Network_cn: 判处长期徒刑可对违法者起到强有力的威慑作用。

核威慑（nuclear deterrence）政策一向是有核武器国持有核武器的藉口，也成为其他国家开发核武器的理由。建立新国际规范，促使 …
英文潮起来~~_English Corner_派派小说 ... 演艺圈 Showbiz 核遏制力 nuclear deterrence 试点，试运行 on a trial basis.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 19th cent.: from Latin deterrent- 'deterring', from the verb deterrere (see deter)

entry.tran: 威慑力量;威慑因素;遏制物
entry.def: A deterrent is something that prevents people from doing something by making them afraid of what will happen to them if they do it.

example.ex: They seriously believe that capital punishment is a deterrent...
example.tran: 他们真的相信死刑具有威慑作用。

example.ex: The tough new law should act as a deterrent.
example.tran: 这项严厉的新法将起到威慑作用。

entry.def: A deterrent is a weapon or set of weapons designed to prevent enemies from attacking by making them afraid to do so.
If something has a deterrent effect, it has the effect of preventing people from doing certain things.

example.ex: Hopefully, that will have a deterrent effect on drug syndicates in the future.
example.tran: 希望这能在将来对贩毒集团起到威慑作用。

example.ex: ...his belief in the deterrent value of capital punishment.

means.word_mean: 1. something immaterial that interferes with or delays action or progress

auth_sentence.content: The sophisticated orchestration is sometimes a deterrent to enjoyment.
auth_sentence.res_content: The sophisticated orchestration is sometimes a deterrent to enjoyment.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The sophisticated orchestration is sometimes a deterrent to enjoyment.

auth_sentence.content: I don't think that's the biggest deterrent.
auth_sentence.res_content: I don't think that's the biggest deterrent.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I don't think that's the biggest deterrent.

auth_sentence.content: The best designs are a deterrent to physical aggression.
auth_sentence.res_content: The best designs are a deterrent to physical aggression.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The best designs are a deterrent to physical aggression.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =earth,表示"土地"; 2. =frighten,可怕,恐惧; 3. =frighten,表示"恐,怕"

stems_affixes.value_cn: [comeing from]地球外的, 宇宙的[outside the earth]
stems_affixes.word_buile: extra外+terrestrial[adj.地球的，地球上的]→adj.[comeing from]地球外的, 宇宙的[outside the earth]
mediterranean而来→n.地中海 adj.地中海的
subterrane[n.下层; 洞穴, 地下室]+ean→adj.地下的
terr土地+estrial→adj.地球的，地球上的
territory[n.领土;版图;领域,范围]+ial……的→territorial领土的
deter[v.威慑,吓住]+ent……的→deterrent威慑的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 很糟的;可怕的,骇人的;极度的,厉害的
stems_affixes.word_buile: terr恐,怕+ible可..的→可怕的
terr恐,怕+ific产生……的→带来可怕→好到让人可怕的地步→极好的
extra外+territorial[adj.领土的,土地的,地方的]+ity表名词→n.治外法权
mediterranean而来→n.地中海 adj.地中海的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 下层; 洞穴, 地下室
stems_affixes.word_buile: sub下面+terr土地+ane→n.下层; 洞穴, 地下室
terr土地+ace→n.平台,阳台,露台
terr土地+ain表名词→n.地势,地形
terr土地+it+ory场所,范围→地的范围,领土
deter[v.威慑,吓住]+ment表名词→n.制止

stems_affixes.value_cn: 恐怖, 可怕的人, 恐怖时期, 恐怖行动
stems_affixes.word_buile: terr恐,怕+or表名词→n.恐怖, 可怕的人, 恐怖时期, 恐怖行动
terror恐怖+ist人→n.恐怖分子
dis离,出+inter埋→v.挖出,掘土
in进+ter=terr土地→v.埋葬
de去+ter=terr恐,怕→吓跑了,吓得不动了
terr恐,怕+ify使……→v.使害怕,使惊恐

means.word_mean: (使别人恐惧或困惑的)制止物,阻碍物

sentences.en: I put a net over my strawberries as a deterrent to the birds.
sentences.cn: 我在草莓上罩了网,免得鸟歇上去。

sentences.en: Large fines act as a deterrent to motorists.
sentences.cn: 高额罚款是对开车的人的制约。
